content.body: raphaellouis: I suspect as with your last idea, defining a holistic model that prevents exfiltration as well as allows for updates will be rather involved; on top of that you have the problem of getting people excited to adopt this model as it would presumably introduce quite some complexity for web developers (also, please see https://heyguys.cc/)
